summary: A command‑line utility that loads multiple Megatron model checkpoint files (.ckpt) located alongside a given .nemo model, computes the average of their weights, and writes the resulting averaged model back to a new .nemo file.
business_intent: Enable users to create a single, more stable and potentially higher‑performing model checkpoint by averaging several training checkpoints, facilitating easier deployment and evaluation of NLP models built with NVIDIA NeMo.
